name: The Nightmare Guardian
description:
Can you survive your job?

Get all the marbles to unlock the exit. Enjoy this horror game created in Unreal Engine 5.

Some features:

  • Scary!
  • Procedurally generated map
  • Minimal map
  • Hunter enemy
  • Graphics settings!
  • "N" To open X-Ray mode
  • "M" To display the map
  • "1" To show a marker to the nearest marble
  • "Q" To show a marker on top of all the marbles
